description: A shell filled with metal pellets and spiked with brimstone.  Extremely damaging, plus the spread makes it very accurate at short range.  Favored by SWAT forces.

9x19mm ammunition with a brimstone jacketed hollow point bullet.  JHP rounds have inferior penetration to FMJ rounds, but their expansion slightly increases stopping power against unarmored targets and reduces overpenetration.

A thin and flat knife made of brimstone for throwing.  Its ineffective cutting edge and odd shape makes it unsuitable for use as a tool.

A kit to attach a pair of arms and a firing rail to the barrel of a firearm.  It allows brimstone slivers to be fired, which it superheats during launch.

An advanced optic that envelops the entire gun with an adjustable circular hologram reticle superimposed on the field of view.  Used extensively by military forces, it increases accuracy and weight while also heating up bullets as they exit the barrel.

An advanced optic that envelops the entire gun with an adjustable circular hologram reticle superimposed on the field of view.  Used extensively by military forces, it increases accuracy and weight while also cooling down bullets as they exit the barrel.

An advanced optic that envelops the entire gun with an adjustable circular hologram reticle superimposed on the field of view.  Used extensively by military forces, it increases accuracy and weight while also tinging bullets with acid as they exit the barrel.

An advanced optic that envelops the entire gun with an adjustable circular hologram reticle superimposed on the field of view.  Used extensively by military forces, it increases accuracy and weight while also animating bullets as they exit the barrel.

An advanced optic that envelops the entire gun with an adjustable circular hologram reticle superimposed on the field of view.  Used extensively by military forces, it increases accuracy and weight while also electrifying bullets as they exit the barrel.

An advanced optic that envelops the entire gun with an adjustable circular hologram reticle superimposed on the field of view.  Used extensively by military forces, it increases accuracy and weight while also purifying bullets as they exit the barrel.
A wrapping for the barrel of a weapon that super heats the it's ammunition to magically make it leave behind a trail of smoke and flame.
A wrapping for the barrel of a weapon that hyper chills it's ammunition to magically make it create clouds of extinguisher wherever it lands.
A wrapping for the barrel of a weapon that half-melts it's ammunition to magically make it create pools of acid wherever it lands.
A wrapping for the barrel of a weapon that poisons it's ammunition to magically make it create clouds of toxic gas wherever it lands.
A wrapping for the barrel of a weapon that hyper chills it's ammunition to magically make it call down bolts of lightning wherever it lands.
A wrapping for the barrel of a weapon that magnifies it's ammunition to magically make it create a flashbang effect wherever it lands.

A bundle of wadding, black gunpowder, and a chunk of brimstone, ready to be loaded into a cannon.
//: 4 pound cannonball weighs 28000 grains,shot at 1215 ft/s by a 3in ordnance rifle, equals 124459 joules of muzzle energy according to Shooters Calculator, round down from square root 352.78
//2: Recoil currently copied from 50 bmg ball as game_balance.md does not state a method for calculating recoil

description: A paper cartridge containing black powder and a piece of brimstone.  Historically used to reload muzzleloaders in a more reasonable time. A simple enough round that even trifling spellcrafters can change it's element without the use of a magic circle.

.50 BMG ammunition with a mild brimstone cored 661gr FMJ bullet.  The .50 BMG is a very powerful rifle round designed for anti-aircraft use, later adapted to anti-vehicular and anti-personnel roles.  Its stupendous energy and armor piercing capabilities make it one of the most deadly rounds available, offset only by its drastic recoil and noise.
